description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This isn't a present day apocalypse. No guns or machetes to help you here. Loot buildings to survive and try to kill the thousands of zombies on the huge map before they eat you! Supports over 1,000,000 zombies in a single level. Music credit: Bensound.com
description.short: This isn't a present day apocalypse. No guns or machetes to help you here. Loot buildings to survive and try to kill the thousands of zombies on the huge map before they eat you! Supports over 1,000,000 zombies in a single level. Music credit: Bensound.com
